attributes.action: nationalise the railway system, and run it on a non profit basis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Back in the 70s and 80s people complained about British Rail, but it was cheaper and much easier to use that what we have now. And the state subsidy was not going into shareholders' pockets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
